backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko actor with all core domain types for incidents, messages, evidence, summaries, police submissions, and victim/stalker profiles.
backend/police-department.mo: Defines the PoliceDepartment record type containing basic department contact and address fields.
backend/stalker-profile.mo: Defines the StalkerProfile type storing optional personal, location, vehicle, and social media details about a suspect.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature definitions, related files, components, and test IDs for Quick Exit functionality and its configuration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides text summaries of various frontend components and hooks, including functionality, UI behavior, and integrations.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and themes for light/dark modes with OKLCH color tokens and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, PWA settings, theming, and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, categories, shortcuts, and display behavior for the Reporther app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Implements service worker logic for caching, runtime updates, offline handling, and message-based skip-waiting support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication state, profile setup flow, quick-exit shortcut, theming, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/CrimeHelp.tsx: Renders educational cards and links providing crime-related legal information and resources.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar managing authentication actions, theme toggling, quick-exit, and displaying the user avatar.
frontend/src/components/IncidentDetail.t: Shows detailed incident info including messages, evidence, stalker data, and police department selection with various UI actions.
frontend/src/components/IncidentForm.tsx: Form for creating incident reports with validation, evidence uploads, and optional stalker profile selection.
Displays a user's incident history, handles loading and errors, and shows details or summaries when selected.
frontend/src/components/InstallationGuid: Provides installation instructions and shareable messages for adding the app to mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveSumma: Fetches and displays an aggregated incident summary with tone analysis, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows a login screen with feature highlights and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/MainContent.tsx: Hosts the main tabbed interface for user profile, reports, incident history, and other tools.
frontend/src/components/MaleUserWarningM: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/MessageGenerator: UI for selecting tone and intensity to generate a contextual message and submit it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Displays generated messages with actions for copying, sharing, SMS sending, and shows tone/intensity labels.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalVide: Empty placeholder component with no content.
frontend/src/components/PoliceReportDial: Dialog for assembling and submitting a police report with selected evidence, victim info options, and validations.
frontend/src/components/PoliceSubmission: Fetches and displays a history of police submissions with evidence details and submission status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple form for saving a user's name to create a personalized caller profile.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Handles showing and managing a PWA installation prompt with iOS support and dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/components/QuickExitSetting: UI for viewing, validating, saving, and resetting the Quick Exit redirect URL with error handling and toasts.
frontend/src/components/SavedStalkerProf: Displays, views, edits, and deletes saved stalker profiles using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/StalkerRecord.ts: Manages current stalker info, saved profiles, and police department selection with tabs, forms, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/components/VictimProfile.ts: Allows users to view and update optional victim profile data with form handling and secure save operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Derives actor readiness, initialization, and error state from React Query cache and useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and status management through a React context.
Provides a React hook that syncs state with localStorage and updates storage on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installation state, detects install capability, and triggers the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, stalker, and related backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and theme variables for light/dark modes plus custom gradients and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/types.ts: Re-exports backend types and enums for consistent frontend typing.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitErrorMessage: Maps actor initialization and network errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/quickExit.ts: Implements a quick-exit system for redirecting to a safe URL with validation and storage.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Provides utilities for copying or sharing URLs using clipboard or Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and safe cleanup of parameters from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/waitForActorReady.ts: Waits for actor initialization by monitoring React Query state with timeout handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, custom colors via CSS variables, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project metadata, existing quick-exit feature requirements, and a pending new feature request.
